alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Lucas; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 11:58AM EST until February 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 14 inches. North Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Hancock, Seneca, Sandusky, Lucas, Ottawa and Wood counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Wednesday to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible tonight and Thursday. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility Thursday afternoon. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute, especially on Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow expected Wednesday evening through Thursday. Snowfall rates may approach one inch per hour at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Hancock; Lucas; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood
